decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
REASON:  To comply with the provisions of Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990.

Condition : 2 - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and documents: Design and Access Statement; PL-100 Rev A; PL-101 Rev A; PL-102 Rev A; PL-103 Rev 103; PL-104 Rev A; PL-105 Rev A; PL-106 Rev A; PL-107 Rev A; PL-109; Rev A; Reasonable Exception Statement; PROPOSED GARAGE PL-101;PROPOSED GARAGE PL-102;
REASON: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.

Condition : 3 - Notwithstanding the approved plans, all brickwork, roof tiles and windows to be used in the construction of the extension, the boundary wall and piers, and the detached garage shall match the appearance of the existing brickwork and windows of the host dwelling.  All other external surfaces shall be constructed in accordance with details provided in the approved drawings. The development shall be retained in that form thereafter.  
REASON:To safeguard the appearance of the locality, the Pinner Hill Estate Conservation Area, and the Area of Special Character within which the application site is located in accordance with Policies D3 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021) and Policies DM1, DM6 and DM7 of Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013).

Condition : 4 - The roof area of the extension hereby permitted shall not be used as a balcony, roof garden or similar amenity area without the grant of further specific permission from the local planning authority.
REASON: To safeguard the residential  amenities of neighbouring residents, in accordance with Policy DM1 of the Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013).
description: Single storey rear extension; external alterations; installation of 1m high brick piers with 900mm high brick and timber fence front boundary wall; detached garage with carport to rear; installation of 1.50m high mechanical metal vehicle access gates with 1.60m high brick piers to front boundary (demolition of detached garage)
